Additional Information:  
• 
Surgical infection can be prevented by pre-operative chlorhexidine gluconate (2%-4%) 
bath/body wipes preferably one day prior to, and on the day of surgery. Adopting hair 
clipping instead of shaving in surgical site preparation can help in reducing surgical site 
infections.
